Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: This restaurant is my favorite. I eat in plenty of restaurants but to this restaurant I  constantly return again and again. The team is very amicable and the food they offer is so delicious. I would always prefer to have a decent dinner in this restaurant. Highly recommended.

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Great food here I definitely recommend this place if you like Indian food and even if you haven't tried it. It is a great place to try Indian food I doubt you'll be disappointed

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Place is just okay. The host was a little rude when I asked if I could sit at the bar. The server was nice and helpful. The lamb was excellent. The garlic naan did not taste like garlic whatsoever. And the rice was just okay. Probably wouldn't see me back in this place.

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: This place can have so much potential the staff was bad and always laughing at their jokes?. The food at least was good but pricey the restaurant has a lot of space that was mostly empty. You have to bring your own alcohol, the restroom smells.

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Bollywood is the best Indian food restaurant in the valley!  I love the chicken tikka masala and the vegetarian dishes are some of the best I've ever tasted.  The restaurant is lively, fun and the service is friendly and quick while the prices are quite reasonable.  So glad it's our neighborhood restaurant!

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: I love this restaurant a lot. there is a different feeling. The meals are exeptionaly good. the service is efficient and the personel is very professional. The pay is fair. I definitely recommend.

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Best Indian food in the valley. I love the korma and the tills masala and the naan. Mostly just get those cause they‚Äôre amazing but we‚Äôre there a lot. Tried other places but they don‚Äôt compare! We always come back to Bollywood Indian!

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Loved the food and ambience. We ordered matar paneer, daal tadka, bhendi masala all with different bread choices like garlic naan and b plain naan, egg fried rice, samosa and tea. The quality and the quantity is awesome! Would go there as many times as I could!

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Super friendly staff. Food was fresh, delicious, served promptly. Clean.

Review Text: Good Indian food. Must try their delicious coconut naan. They can't serve alcohol at this branch because of a nearby school. Pleasant enough ambience.

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Great service, the staff is always so polite and attentive. The food is consistently good. My favorite Indian restaurant in Sherman Oaks and we have a lot of them here!

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: Nice service, but the food was just terrible. Even the sauces that they put on the table were unedable. We travel the world for Indian restaurants, and these people certainly have lost any quality that we might have completely... Save your money and go elsewhere.

Name: Bollywood Indian Restaurant
Review Text: (Delivery via Eat24) Sauce for tikka and curry (bhuna) was bland, very very bland. No flavor but salt and spice. The meat was dry. Had high hopes are seeing all the reviews on Google and eat 24 and was really disappointed. Will no be ordering from them again. Still edible and didn't make me sick so two stars.
